blog.name: scene-on-the-screen
blog.title: What I've Seen
blog.description:
Just a tumblr for the movies (film or televised: mini-series, one-off shows..) I've seen.
My original blog (seen-on-the-screen) was regretfully lost with the password change of 2016 since I had used a throwaway email that was erased after 2 years of unuse. So this is my Phoenix Project as I try to rebuild what was lost.

tags: bls give me love and validation i desperately need it
body:
My name is Peter

part 1 of a 3-4 part series that i hope will do well (im taggin it with ‘my name is peter’ if anyone cares.)

—————————————————————

“Look, we can talk about this!”

“No, we can’t. You either live as a girl under my roof or you don’t live here at all.”

“Please don’t do this. I think you’re over-reacting.” The woman standing in the doorway turned to the child on her doorstep and glared at them.

“Get out.” She hissed, throwing a duffel bag at the child and slamming the door. The kid slumped onto the step and looked out into his street. It was late at night, about 10 and the kid had made a mistake.

“What is this?” The kids mother came into their room holding a wet chest binder. The kids stomach dropped and they immediately began to sweat.

“It-it’s a chest,” they took a shaky breath. “a chest binder.” Their mother’s face twisted in confusion.

“What does it do?”

“Makes-it makes my chest flat.” The look of confusion became one of disgust.

“Why would you want that? Your body is beautiful. What are you, trying to be a transvestite or something?” The kids ears burned.

“It’s called being transgender.”

“Not in my house it isn’t. This is disgusting, I’ throwing this out.”

“Mom, wait no! Don’t please, it makes me happy.”

“It makes you a freak.”

The kid had tried to explain to their mom that they wanted to change their name and started using male pronouns, but his mom had none of it. He wasn’t a he, he was a she. And there was nothing ‘she’ could do about it. After a lengthy fight about it, his mom became so angry and disgusted, she decided he needed to leave. The boy quickly began to pack a bag, throwing in the secret pairs of boxers and his extra binder. He threw in his jeans and hoodies, hoping they would keep him warm in the upcoming winter. He continued to try and plead with his mother, but she wasn’t interested. Now he was sat on a step outside his home, or his previous home. He supposed the best thing to do would be to leave before the drug dealers came out. Shuffling to the nearest bus stop, the boy began to contemplate what name he should choose. It kept his mind of the incident and he needed a new one anyway. He opened his phone, and googled “popular baby names of 2001”. The results didn’t show anything that particularly stood out. He decided that 2001 wasn’t the best year for boys names and broadened his search. His last name, Parker seemed to go with any name but none of them felt right. Jacob Parker, Dylan Parker, Austin Parker, none of these fit. Beginning to get frustrated, he turned off his phone. He would continue his search tomorrow. For now, he had to hope there was a bus running this late.

blog.name: thefutureisfantastic
blog.title: The Future Is Fantastic!
blog.description: Your source for sci-fi, horror, and fantasy news! Edited by Brandon Gantt

summary:
The Return of the Fantastic Four 

– Fantastic Four #1 Launch Trailer

 

57 years to the day that the world was introduced to...
caption:
The Return of the Fantastic Four  – Fantastic Four #1 Launch Trailer

57 years to the day that the world was introduced to the Fantastic Four, a new tale will begin for Ben, Johnny, Reed and Sue when FANTASTIC FOUR #1 hits comic shops, featuring an all-new story from superstar creators Dan Slott and Sara Pichelli!

Marvel is proud to present this behind-the-scenes look at FANTASTIC FOUR, featuring Slott, SVP and Executive Editor Tom Brevoort, and Editor-in-Chief C.B. Cebulski!

“One of the strengths of Stan and Jack is that you never knew what you were going to get in Fantastic Four. You’re always seeing new worlds, you’re always seeing new ideas,” says Slott.

“Sara Pichelli has such a wonderful sense of character and sensitivity in her drawings that she really brings these characters to live,” adds Brevoort. 

Don’t miss FANTASTIC FOUR #1, on sale now in comic shops, on the Marvel Comics App, and on Marvel.com!

To find a comic shop near you, visit www.comicshoplocator.com or call 1-888-comicbook.

blog.name: sir-i-venom
blog.title: Sir. Venom
blog.description: Venom Fan page. I don't own most of the art here. If it's yours and want credit or to be taken down just ask.

summary:
Another new comic announced. Web of Venom: Carnage Bron.
Its written by Donny Cates and I'm loving his writing on venom so I'm...
body:
Another new comic announced. Web of Venom: Carnage Bron.

Its written by Donny Cates and I’m loving his writing on venom so I’m looking forward to this.

Also I love the idea of making the Web of Venom like an anthology comic whete each issue covers a different part of Venom and symbiote Lore.

This also makes me wonder of carnage will appear in tbe new Venom run some time soon.

Either way I’m exited for this comic. Comes out this November

blog.name: arctizii
blog.title: Just an usual blog.
blog.description: Weirdest mix of fandoms, spoilers, memes and very unusual opinions. It's mostly about Supernatural, The Arcana and MCU these days. I stan villains like Lucifer and Loki. I hated infinity war, I hated the endgame, I hate the russo brothers. For me, everything that happened after Thor Ragnarok isn't canon. Have fun convincing me otherwise

summary: Im not the author of this theory, but fuck.
body:
Im not the author of this theory, but fuck.

Loki is alive and we know it, if you don’t agree then stop reading right there and come back when you’ll accept that you’re wrong.

But what if he died in the Snap?

And when everyone will come back, Loki will just appear out of nowhere, behind Thor’s back and be like “…Brother?”

Im not the author of this theory, but fuck.

Loki is alive and we know it, if you don’t agree then stop reading right there and come back when you’ll accept that you’re wrong.

But what if he died in the Snap?

And when everyone will come back, Loki will just appear out of nowhere, behind Thor’s back and be like “…Brother?”
trail.content:
Im not the author of this theory, but fuck.

Loki is alive and we know it, if you don’t agree then stop reading right there and come back when you’ll accept that you’re wrong.

But what if he died in the Snap?

And when everyone will come back, Loki will just appear out of nowhere, behind Thor’s back and be like “…Brother?”
